experiences.title: Trainee IT specialist system integration
experiences.description: I'm a Trainee IT Specialist in System Integration, passionate about building and maintaining efficient IT systems. I am currently gaining hands-on experience in network setup, system administration, and troubleshooting. Always eager to learn and grow, I aim to support businesses with reliable and modern IT solutions.

experiences.title: Student
experiences.description: Developed and maintained multiple projects, implemented responsive designs, and integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality. I did this all in my freetime, while being in school.
